alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Jefferson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 27 at 2:13PM CDT until May 27 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... French Broad River Near Newport TN affecting Cocke and Jefferson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...French Broad River near Newport TN. * WHEN...Until midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Agricultural land near the gage on Highway 321 is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM EDT Friday the stage was 11.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will continue to fall below stage by midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 24.0 feet on 03/01/1967. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1200 AM EDT.
